sources.title: Four Boys And A Gun (1957) Frank Sutton, Tarry Green, James Franciscus, William Hinnant, Otto Hulett, Robert Dryden
sources.description: Four Boys and a Gun is a 1957 American film NOlR crime film directed by William Berke and written by Leo Townsend and Philip Yordan. The film stars Frank Sutton, Tarry Green, James Franciscus, William Hinnant, Otto Hulett and Robert Dryden. Â  You can find out more about this movie from Wikipedia .

sources.title: 1957 - Four Boys and a Gun - William Berke - VOSE
sources.description: For Academic - Educational Use Only https://derechonoir.wordpress.com/

metadata.Plot: Four boys are involved in a robbery in which a policeman is killed. Caught, they are told they will most-definitely be convicted. Three will get life sentences and only one will be given the chair if they tell who pulled the trigger. Left to themselves, the boys must decide which will forfeit their life for the others. Will it be the one who actually pulled the trigger, the one who has a family, the one who brought the gun in the first place, or the one who has the least prospects of leading a happy life if ever paroled.
metadata.Writer: Philip Yordan, Leo Townsend, Willard Wiener
metadata.Actors: Otto Hulett, Robert Dryden, J. Pat O'Malley
